title: Tata Curvv EV, ICE models revealed. Check launch details, price and features
description: Tata Motors unveiled Tata Curvv ICE and EV, launching August 7. The SUV coup√© follows the multi-powertrain strategy, debuting with the EV version. Shailesh Chandra highlights its pioneering SUV legacy and aerodynamic design. Features premium performance in petrol and diesel options, advanced infotainment, smart features, panoramic glass roof. Pricing undisclosed; interest solicited.
